title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:29 <rrodriguez> has quit  
07:44 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:44 <@sdumitriu> As always, mflorea is the first one up  
07:44 <+mflorea> :)  
08:22 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:35 <tekzilla> has quit  
08:37 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
09:06 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:32 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
10:09 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:37 <vmassol> has quit  
10:40 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:48 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: still up? I have a question.  
11:09 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning  
11:09 <vmassol> someone reported an error to me on the wysiwyg editor  
11:09 <vmassol> would like to know if it's known to you already  
11:10 <+mflorea> vmassol: Hi  
11:10 <vmassol> to reproduce: http://pastebin.com/JEt9HM6w  
11:10 <vmassol> then in the editor, put the cursor at the end of theURL in the section "== Les mains dans le cambouis & outils de l'épisode ==" and press enter  
11:11 <vmassol> the cursor moves to the next header instead of creating a new line  
11:11 <vmassol> on chrome/mac osx  
11:11 <vmassol> I can create a jira issue if it's not known already  
11:13 <+mflorea> works on FF so it must be a Chrome issue. you can report it  
11:14 <vmassol> ok  
11:17 <vmassol> mflorea: done, http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-7086  
11:17 <+mflorea> thanks  
11:50 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
13:18 <lucaa> has quit  
14:21 <+Denis> vmassol: Hi, any progress on adding locale (and version) to references ? do you have anything locally to share ?  
14:27 <rrodriguez> has quit  
14:30 <vmassol> hi Denis. Not really. I had progressed and then we had our skype call. After that I haven't updated what I had yet.  
14:35 <@cjdelisl1> I have a patch for XWIKI-7085 which is to change the classes such as com.xpn.xwiki.doc.FilesystemAttachmentContent to org.xwiki.store.legacy.doc.internal.FilesystemAttachmentContent, WDYT?  
14:36 <vmassol> yep seen your jira cjdelisl1 but I haven't taken the time to look at the code and consequences  
14:36 <vmassol> I'd say go ahead  
14:36 <@cjdelisl1> ok, thanks  
14:36 <vmassol> with mention in the release notes  
14:39 <@cjdelisl1> ahh good thinking  
14:39 <@cjdelisl1> that never should have been exposed and it should have no consequences that it's moved  
14:39 <vmassol> ok cool then  
14:45 <+tmortagne> cjdelisl1: +1  
15:39 <vmassol> there's already RN for 3.3M1 cjdelisl1  
15:40 <vmassol> http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise33M1  
15:48 <@cjdelisl1> yea, just found it  
15:55 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki  
16:42 <sburjan> has quit  
16:51 <vmassol> cjdelisl1: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7088 has just been reported ;)  
16:52 <@cjdelisl1> thanks  
16:58 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
17:09 <silviar> has quit  
17:20 <@sdumitriu> Good morning everyone  
17:20 <vmassol> gm  
17:21 <@sdumitriu> tmortagne: Is there a way to get a list of "most popular" extensions to display when opening the extension manager's "Add extensions" page?  
17:22 <vmassol> sdumitriu: AFAIK the "social" features are not done yet. Actually tmortagne is there any plan for them?  
17:22 <vmassol> ie post 3.x cycle or in 3.x?  
17:22 <vmassol> personally I'd say 4.x  
17:22 <vmassol> so that we focus on having a strong EM in 3.x  
17:23 <vmassol> strong and stable  
17:23 <@sdumitriu> Who wants to be build manager this week?  
17:27 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: sorry don't get notification anymore when there is message here... reading  
17:27 <+tmortagne> sdumitriu: there is no social feature in EM right now  
17:28 <+tmortagne> see http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/ExtensionManagerSocial  
17:28 <+tmortagne> vmassol: no there is no date, just a TODO  
17:56 <vmassol> have I killed xwiki.org?  
18:27 <vmassol> has quit  
18:28 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
18:50 <sburjan> has quit  
18:53 <Ruudjah> has joined #xwiki  
19:03 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:35 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
20:09 <@sdumitriu> cjdelisl1: Can you be the build manager for this week?  
20:11 <@cjdelisl1> I'm really busy this month getting ready for winter but I can help with it.  
22:42 <abusenius> has quit  
23:01 <vmassol> has quit  
23:55 <Ruudjah> has quit
